org.dockbox.selene.core.server

Class Selene

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dockbox.selene.core.server.Selene

  • public final class Selene
extends java.lang.Object
    The global Selene instance used to grant access to various components.

    • Method Detail

      • getServer

        public static SeleneBootstrap getServer()
        Gets the instance of Selene.
        Returns:
        The Selene instance

      • handle

        public static void handle(@Nullable
                          @Nullable java.lang.String msg,
                          @Nullable
                          java.lang.Throwable... e)
        Handles a given exception and message using the injected ExceptionHelper instance. Uses the global preferences as defined in GlobalConfig to use either the ExceptionLevels.FRIENDLY or ExceptionLevels.MINIMAL level. Additionally this also performs the preference for whether or not to print stacktraces, using GlobalConfig.getStacktracesAllowed()
        Parameters:
        msg - The message, usually provided by the developer causing the exception. Can be null.
        e - Zero or more exceptions (varargs)

      • log

        public static org.slf4j.Logger log()
        Provides quick access to SeleneBootstrap.log(). Primarily added to avoid SeleneBootstrap.log() from being used globally.
        Returns:
        The Logger

      • getResourceFile

        public static Exceptional<java.nio.file.Path> getResourceFile(java.lang.String name)
        Attempts to look up a resource file. If the file exists it is wrapped in a Exceptional and returned. If the file does not exist or is a directory, a empty Exceptional is returned. If the requested file name is invalid, or null, a Exceptional containing the appropriate exception is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file to look up
        Returns:
        The resource file wrapped in a Exceptional, or a appropriate Exceptional (either empty or providing the appropriate exception).
